Question
========
  
Ilja suspects that the positive relationship between intelligence and school performance among high school students is stronger the higher they score on intrinsic motivation. He takes an IQ test from a sample of high school students and uses questionnaires to measure school performance (mean grade) and intrinsic motivation (scores from 0 to 100). What analysis technique should he use to test his hypothesis? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression
* Multiple linear regression
* Two-way ANOVA
* ANCOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
